title: Welcome the Second Coming of Jesus Christ | Gospel Movie Trailer "Break the Spell"

json.text: No matter what, we must hold on to the Bible and the Lord's name.
We wait like this for the Lord to come with clouds and take us;
it won't be wrong.
If we just keep watching the skies and waiting blindly,
will we ever meet the Lord?
We have waited and waited but still the Lord has not come.
Just what is going on?
In the last days, God is incarnated and descends in secret
to begin the judgment from the house of God,
and make a group of overcomers before the disaster.
Then God shall descend with the clouds to openly appear to all.
I only believe in the Lord Jesus who descends with the clouds.
This cannot be wrong.
Amen!
I will not accept unless the Lord descends with the clouds
taking believers to the kingdom of heaven! (Yeah. Yes.)
The Lord Jesus said many words about His return,
but you only hold the one where He descends with the clouds,
and don't investigate the other prophecies spoken by the Lord.
This makes it easy to walk down the wrong path and be abandoned by the Lord!
We wait for the Lord descending with the clouds
to take us up into heavenly kingdom.
It aligns with the Bible!
To believe in the Bible is to believe in the Lord.
Straying from the Bible means not believing in the Lord!
Can the Bible replace God's work?
It can't.
Is God greater or the Bible?
Does the Bible save people or does God save people?
We have to obey what the pastors say.
We can't accept anything that's not in the Bible.
Absolutely right.
We can't go wrong if we stick to the Bible.
If we obey pastors and elders, we obey the Lord!
Amen!
If we resist them, then we resist the Lord!
The Lord Jesus never said obeying pastors and elders is obeying the Lord.
As a believer of the Lord,
why do you act not on the Lord's words but listen to the pastors and elders?
Who exactly are you believing in, the Lord Jesus or pastors and elders?
Almighty God's words let us understand what believing in God is.
Yes.
Almighty God's words let us know the truth and gain discernment.
Amen! Praise God!
We have broken the spell that trapped our belief in the Lord for years!
Amen! Praise God.
